EmailTemplate.subject: Exciting opportunities from The Challenge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
We hope that you had a good break and that you aren't having to work too hard at sixth form or college.
Below are some great opportunities to develop yourself, your CV and have a great time.
Please get in touch if you have any questions.
Liam Midlands NCS Grad Team
The BIG Sleepout
Want a great overnight reunion with NCS friends? Want to make a difference and raise awareness about homelessness?
Keep an eye on your emails in the next month for your invite to The BIG Sleepout. Put it in your diaries...the evening of 4th - morning of 5th March.
More details soon! Don't forget about the NCS Opportunity Hub
Make sure you keep checking our NCS Opportunity Hub, there will be loads to get involved in. Go to http://opportunityhub.ncsyes.co.uk/ and use your log in details from graduation to get all the information! Wolverhampton's New Youth Zone
Wolverhampton's brand new youth zone, The Way, opens it doors tomorrow. It's great news for young people across the Black Country as this new youth centre. Activities range from indoor rock climbing and other outdoor trips to recording music in their brand new state of the art facilities.
Doors open for the first time tomorrow at 10am, so why not check it out.
http://thewayyouthzone.org/
